globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://raw.githubusercontent.com https://assets.pokemon.com; font-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://beta.pokeapi.co https://pokeapi.co; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; media-src 'self' https://assets.pokemon.com
